text: @yabutaleb7 @qjurecic Absolutely amazing article. Scary as hell. I cannot for the life of me, understand how 48% of Americans think Trump & WH are doing a good job with their handling if the Coronavirus. All I can say is, the daily briefings are making Americans stupider and disinformation is winning!
